授業目的: The purpose of this course is to provide a practical understanding of the internal and external stimuli of consumer behavior. This course will focus on consumers as individuals and decision-makers in the 21st century.
到達目標:
1.Students will be able to recognize consumers as individuals and decision-makers.
2.Students will develop a practical understanding of consumer behavior models and how they relate to marketing strategies.
3.Students will develop the ability to recognize the complexity of consumer decision-making in various settings.
4.Students will develop a practical understanding of the technological influence on consumer behavior in the digital world.
授業方法: Online Format. Lecture, discussion, group work and presentation
